resources.string: FairEmail is an open source email app focused on privacy and security. For this reason some features might work differently from what you are used to.
For example, messages will always be reformatted to remove unsafe elements and to improve readability and opening links needs to be confirmed for safety.

THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE AUTHOR \'\'AS IS\'\' AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
FairEmail is not supported on this device because bugs in Android cause crashes

Receiving and sending messages requires setting up an account and an identity like in any other email app. The quick setup will create both an account and identity by just asking for your name, email address and password. Accounts and identities (aliases) can be setup manually too if needed.
To quickly setup an account and an identity for most providers
The quick setup will fetch configuration information from autoconfig.thunderbird.net
Authorizing Google accounts will work in official versions only because Android checks the app signature
Please grant permissions to select an account and read your name
An account and an identity have successfully been added
You can try to configure an account and an identity below too
To change color, swipe left/right target folder, etc
To change name, color, signature, etc
In the next dialog, select \"All apps\" at the top, select this app and select and confirm \"Don\'t optimize\"
Imported accounts will be added without overwriting any existing ones
The system themes will automatically switch to light/dark on day/night, if supported by Android
Suggest addresses found in sent messages
Suggest addresses found in received messages
Reply or Forward prefixes subject once
Auto resize attached and embedded images
Message and attachment download limit on metered connections
Download messages and attachments while roaming
Warn if received message was not authenticated
Show colored background instead of colored stars
Show remote content when viewing original messages
Show relative position in a conversation
Scroll to top on receiving new messages
Expand one message at a time
Back press collapse messages in conversations
Show unread count badge on icon
Notification content shown when biometric auth used
At most three actions will be shown
New message notifications will always be removed on being swiped away and on marking messages read
Tap on the channel name \'Notifications\' to set the default notification sound, etc
Periodically check if FairEmail is still active
Globally disable or enable receiving of messages
You can manually sync by pulling down the message list.
Periodic sync compares all messages with server,\nwhich uses more power. Always sync monitors for only changes.
Tap on a time to set a time
If provider lacks support for feature, it may sync all or no messages
Uses extra data and power for large number of messages
Disabling can reduce data and battery usage marginally
In addition to contacts provided by Android
Like mobile data or paid Wi-Fi hotspots
Disabling will stop sending and receiving of messages over mobile data
Assuming no roaming within the EU
Messages headers will still be fetched. Disable internet on device\'s roaming setting to stop this.
Fetch more messages when scrolling down
Grouped by date if messages sorted by time
Group messages related to each other
If disabled, only names will be shown when available
Only available when message text has been downloaded
Inline images are images included in the message
Automatically open last unread message in a conversation
Multiple expanded messages will always be closed on \'back\'
Close conversations when all messages are archived, sent or trashed
Most providers do not allow modified sender addresses
Enable extra logging and show debug information at various places
This will delete all temporary files
Identity colors take precedence over account colors
In case of \'invalid greeting\', \'requires valid address\' or a similar error, try to change this setting
Frequency of refreshing the connection for push messages or frequency of checking for new messages
Disable this only in case of empty messages or corrupt attachments
Use local IP address instead of host name
No primary account or no drafts folder
Sending emails requires at least one identity
This provider does not support push messages. This will delay reception of new messages and increase battery usage.
This provider does not support UTF-8
An identity is required to send messages
A drafts folder is required to send messages
POP3 downloads and deletes messages only from inbox. It cannot mark messages as read or move them. POP3 will more power and data than IMAP. Use IMAP if possible.
Delete operations with an error message?
Check periodically instead of continuous synchronize
Automatically download message texts and attachments
Increasing this value will increase battery and data usage
Automatically move old messages to trash
Permanently delete this folder and any messages it contains?
This read receipt only acknowledges that the message was displayed. There is no guarantee that the recipient has read the message contents.
An outdated app sent a file path instead of a file stream
No or no suitable internet connection
Synchronization will be performed on next account connection
Messages moved across accounts will be downloaded again resulting in extra data usage
Some attachments or images were not downloaded and could not be added
Showing original message can leak privacy sensitive info
Showing images can leak privacy sensitive information
Images recognized as tracking images will not be shown
Delete replied/forwarded message text? This cannot be undone.
Delete local messages? Messages will remain on the remote server.
Error reporting will help improve FairEmail
Did you intend to add an attachment?
This dialog will still be available via the three-dots overflow menu in the action bar
$name$ will be replaced by the sender full name
$email$ will be replaced by the sender email address
Stop processing rules after executing this rule
This action will be applied to new messages arriving in the folder %1$s
From the end of the time condition
All messages in same conversation and folder
This will send the intent \'%1$s\' with the extras \'%2$s\'
Number of days to synchronize / to keep messages
Number of message downloaded / headers fetched
To limit data and power usage, only some messages and folders are synced by default
If you have a question or a problem, please use the support menu to get help
Swipe left to trash; Swipe right to archive (if available); The swipe actions can be configured in the account settings
Long press a message to start selecting multiple messages; Hold and swipe up or down to select more messages
Downloading messages can take some time, depending on the speed of the provider, internet connection and device and on the number of messages. While downloading messages the app might respond slower.
Information will be retrieved from ipinfo.io
There is an update to version %1$s available
Do you have a question or problem?
Do not ask this again for %1$s
Try FairEmail, an open source, privacy friendly email app for Android

Developing FairEmail took literally thousands of hours and despite that most features are free to use. To make FairEmail sustainable in the long term, some convenience and advanced features are not free to use. FairEmail displays a small message to remind you of this, which will be removed if you purchase the pro features.
Buying pro features will allow you to use all current and future pro features, will keep this app maintained, and supported.
Please see this FAQ about the price of the pro features
FairEmail needs your help. Tap to purchase pro features to keep the project going.
Please describe the problem and indicate the time of the problem:
Please describe what you were doing when the app crashed:
